content.name: Property Owned Expand/Collapse
content.author: Chem O`Dun
content.description:
Small QoL mod which adds an Expand All / Collapse All button to the Property Owned Information tab.
[h2][b]Limitations[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]Strictly depend[/b] on the [b]UI Extensions and HUD[/b] mod by [b]kuertee[/b] to be installed and enabled. [/list]
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] One button to expand or collapse all items in the Property Owned Information tab. [*] Works for four tabs: All, Stations, Fleets and Unassigned Ships. [*] From version 1.01 supports [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/842]Custom Tabs[/url] mod by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/users/7018859]Mycu[/url]. [*] Make only first level expansion. [*] Collapse all levels of expanded items with one button. [*] Uses the same style as other expand/collapse buttons in the game. [/list]
[h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b] 7.60 or newer (tested on 7.60 and 8.00). [*] [b]UI Extensions and HUD[/b] by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/kuertee?gameId=2659]kuertee[/url] to be installed and enabled. Version [b]7.60[/b] and upper is required. [list] [*] It is available only via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/552]UI Extensions and HUD[/url] [/list] [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b] by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url] to be installed and enabled. Version [b]1.91[/b] and upper is required. [list] [*] It is available via Steam - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Or via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Installation[/b][/h2]
You can download the latest version via Steam client - [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3616522826]Property Owned Expand/Collapse[/url] Or you can do it via the Nexus Mods - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1898]Property Owned Expand/Collapse[/url]
[h2][b]Usage[/b][/h2]
Simply press the button :-) on the level with the [b]Property Owned[/b] label in appropriate informational tab.
[h2][b]Video[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Video demonstration of the Property Owned Expand/Collapse. Version 1.00 [previewyoutube=SwiATdxiA1k;full][/previewyoutube] [*] Video demonstration of the Property Owned Expand/Collapse. Version 1.01. Support for Custom Tabs [previewyoutube=Z3KVzJA-q7E;full][/previewyoutube] [/list] [h2][b]Credits[/b][/h2] [list] [*] Author: Chem O`Dun, on [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/ChemODun/mods?gameId=2659]Nexus Mods[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/chemodun/myworkshopfiles/?appid=392160]Steam Workshop[/url] [*] [i]"X4: Foundations"[/i] is a trademark of [url=https://www.egosoft.com]Egosoft[/url]. [/list] [h2][b]Acknowledgements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [url=https://www.egosoft.com]EGOSOFT[/url] — for the X series. [*] [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url] — for the Mod Support APIs that power the UI hooks. [*] [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/Forleyor?gameId=2659]Forleyor[/url] — for his constant help with understanding the UI modding! [*] [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/kuertee?gameId=2659]kuertee[/url] — for his exciting [b]UI Extensions and HUD[/b] that makes this extension possible. [*] [url=https://www.reddit.com/user/3punkt1415/]3punkt1415[/url] - for the idea of the mod itself. [/list]

text.description:
Small QoL mod which adds an Expand All / Collapse All button to the Property Owned Information tab.
Depend on the 'UI Extensions and HUD' mod by `kuertee` to be installed and enabled

Petit mod QoL qui ajoute un bouton Tout développer / Tout réduire à l'onglet Informations sur les biens possédés.
Nécessite l'installation et l'activation du mod 'UI Extensions and HUD' de `kuertee`.

Pequeño mod QoL que añade un botón Expandir todo / Contraer todo a la pestaña Información de Propiedades Poseídas.
Depende de que el mod 'UI Extensions and HUD' de `kuertee` esté instalado y habilitado.

Piccolo mod QoL che aggiunge un pulsante Espandi tutto / Comprimi tutto alla scheda Informazioni sulle Proprietà Possedute.
Richiede che il mod 'UI Extensions and HUD' di `kuertee` sia installato e abilitato.

Malý QoL mod, který přidává tlačítko Rozbalit vše / Sbalit vše na kartu Informace o vlastněném majetku.
Vyžaduje nainstalovaný a povolený mod 'UI Extensions and HUD' od `kuertee`.

Small QoL mod which adds an Expand All / Collapse All button to the Property Owned Information tab.
Depend on the 'UI Extensions and HUD' mod by `kuertee` to be installed and enabled

Mały mod QoL, który dodaje przycisk Rozwiń wszystko / Zwiń wszystko do zakładki Informacje o posiadanych obiektach.
Wymaga zainstalowanego i włączonego modu 'UI Extensions and HUD' autorstwa `kuertee`.

Kleines QoL-Mod, das der Registerkarte Besitzinformationen eine Schaltfläche Alle ausklappen / Alle einklappen hinzufügt.
Benötigt das von `kuertee` stammende Mod 'UI Extensions and HUD' in installierter und aktivierter Form.

Pequeno mod QoL que adiciona um botão Expandir Tudo / Recolher Tudo à guia Informações de Propriedades Possuídas.
Depende de o mod 'UI Extensions and HUD' de `kuertee` estar instalado e habilitado.
所有資産情報タブに「すべて展開 / すべて折りたたむ」ボタンを追加する小さなQoLモッドです。「UI Extensions and HUD」モッド（作成者 `kuertee`）がインストールされ有効化されている必要があります。
소유 자산 정보 탭에 '모두 펼치기 / 모두 접기' 버튼을 추가하는 작은 QoL 모드입니다. `kuertee`의 'UI Extensions and HUD' 모드가 설치되어 활성화되어 있어야 합니다.
为“拥有资产信息”选项卡添加“全部展开 / 全部折叠”按钮的小型QoL模组。需要安装并启用由 `kuertee` 制作的“UI Extensions and HUD”模组。
প্রপার্টি ওউন্ড ইনফরমেশন ট্যাবে সব প্রসারিত / সব সঙ্কুচিত বোতাম যোগ করে এমন ছোট QoL মড। `kuertee`-এর 'UI Extensions and HUD' মডটি ইনস্টল ও সক্রিয় থাকতে হবে।

Mülkiyet Bilgisi sekmesine Tümünü Genişlet / Tümünü Daralt düğmesi ekleyen küçük bir QoL modu.
`kuertee` tarafından geliştirilen 'UI Extensions and HUD' modunun kurulu ve etkin olması gerekir.

Невеликий QoL-мод, що додає кнопку «Розгорнути все / Згорнути все» на вкладку «Інформація про власність».
Потрібно, щоб мод 'UI Extensions and HUD' від `kuertee` був встановлений і увімкнений.
